comment:
* Interface used to push the sound dose related information from the audio
 * server to the AudioService#SoundDoseHelper.

methods.name: public void onMomentaryExposure(float currentMel, int deviceId) throws android.os.RemoteException
methods.comment: Called whenever the momentary exposure exceeds the RS2 value.

methods.name: public void onNewCsdValue(float currentCsd, android.media.SoundDoseRecord[] records) throws android.os.RemoteException
methods.comment:
* Notifies that the CSD value has changed. The currentCsd is normalized
   * with value 1 representing 100% of sound dose. SoundDoseRecord represents
   * the newest record that lead to the new currentCsd.

methodNames: public void onMomentaryExposure(float currentMel, int deviceId) throws android.os.RemoteException
public void onNewCsdValue(float currentCsd, android.media.SoundDoseRecord[] records) throws android.os.RemoteException
